info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 28 at 6:13AM CDT until March 28 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Brownsville TX
info.description:
FFWBRO
The National Weather Service in Brownsville has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... Cameron County in deep south Texas... Central Willacy County in deep south Texas...
* Until 930 AM CDT.
* At 613 AM CDT, Emergency management reported multiple flooding roads and ongoing flash flooding. Between 6 and 10 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of up to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Emergency management reported.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Harlingen, San Benito, Los Fresnos, Lyford, Rancho Viejo, Rio Hondo, Los Indios, Arroyo City, Laureles, Olmito, La Paloma, Sebastian, Rangerville, Santa Maria, Brownsville, San Perlita, Rio Hondo Elementary School, Rio Hondo High School, Rio Hondo Junior High School and Rio Hondo City Hall.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 9:30 AM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 9:30 AM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 28 at 6:13AM CDT until March 28 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Brownsville TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 9:30 AM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 9:30 AM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
